root: ^You wouldn’t kill another man, would you?
^A fellow inmate, culled by the same wardens you were?
^I had a wife, you know. She loved me more than anything.
^There was an incident. I wasn’t making her happy enough. It got a bit messy.
^Bliss isn’t supposed to be messy. We were impure.
^Anyway, she doesn’t know me anymore. She didn’t want to keep such upsetting thoughts.
